F. TRONCONI (2005). Identità etnica e competizione politica. Un'analisi del
voto ai partiti etnoregionalisti in Europa Occidentale. RIVISTA ITALIANA DI
SCIENZA POLITICA, vol. XXXV, p. 77-106, ISSN: 0048-8402

Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Coordinatore della redazione della Rivista Italiana di Scienza Politica
Coordinatore del Comitato editoriale dell'annuario Politica in Italia (ed. Il Mulino) / Italian Politics (ed. Berghahn)

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: A Post-Rokkan Europe? Cultural, Economic, and Institutional Relations Between Centers and Peripheries and their Impact upon Ethnoregional Politics, presented at the ECPR Joint Sessions of Workshops, Edinburgh, March 28 – April 2, 2003.
I partiti etnoregionalisti in Europa occidentale: un’analisi comparata, presented at the Italian Political Science Association annual meeting, Trento, September 14-16, 2003.
Party Systems and Party Competition in European Regions: A Comparative Exploration, presented at the ECPR Joint Sessions of Workshops, Granada, April 14-19, 2005.
Sistema partitico e partiti antisistema : quale relazione ?, presented at the Italian Political Science Association annual meeting, Bologna, September 12-14, 2006.

From Electoral Rules to Parliamentary Roles. A Diachronical Analysis of Electoral Systems, Parliamentary Profiles and Legislative Behaviour in the Italian Case, presented at the Italian Political Science Association annual meeting, Pavia, September 4-6, 2009. (with F. Marangoni)
Looking for Locals? Electoral reforms and intraparty competition in Italy, presented at the 5th ECPR General Conference, Potsdam, September 10-12, 2009. (with F. Marangoni)
Electoral Reform in Italy and Japan. Unanticipated Outcomes?, presented at the annual APSA meeting. Washington, September 2-5, 2010. (with E. Scheiner)

Rappresentanti di chi? Parlamentari e consiglieri regionali fra partiti e constituency elettorale, presented at the Italian Political Science Association annual meeting. Palermo, September 8-10, 2011. (with G. Sandri)
Ethnoregionalist Parties in Regional Governments, presented at the ECPR Joint Sessions of Workshops. Antwerp, April 10-15, 2012.
The Strength of Weak Ties in Legislative Arenas, presented at the Inaugural General Conference of the ECPR Standing Group on Parliaments. Dublin, June 24-27, 2012. (with L. Curini and F. Marangoni)

Interest Groups in the Italian Parliament between Parties and Individual Representation, presented at the Italian Political Science Association annual meeting. Firenze, September 12-14, 2013. (with F. Marangoni)
Interest Groups in the Italian Parliament between Parties and Individual Representation, presented at the 7th ECPR General Conference, Bordeaux, September 4-7, 2013 (with F. Marangoni)

La nuova rivoluzione nel ceto parlamentare. Spiegazioni congiunturali e interpretazioni diacroniche, presented at the Italian Political Science Association annual meeting. Firenze, September 12-14, 2013. (with L. Verzichelli)

Interest Groups in the Italian Parliament between Parties and Individual Representation, presented at the Italian Political Science Association annual meeting. Firenze, September 12-14, 2013. (with F. Marangoni)
Reinforcing Change? The EU and the emergence of Podemos and M5S, presented at the XII meeting of the Spanish Political Science Association. San Sebastián, July 13-15, 2015. (with F. García Lupato)

Il Movimento 5 Stelle fra blog, social network e territorio: gli attivisti e l'organizzazione a livello locale, presented at the Italian Political Science Association annual meeting. Perugia, September 11-13, 2015. (with M.E. Lanzone)

Empowering Sub-National Elites? The Effects of Personalisation and Federalisation on Multi-Level Career Paths, paper presented at the XXIV IPSA World Congress of Political Science. Poznań, July 23-28, 2016. (with L. Verzichelli)

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Visiting Scholar at the Center for the Study of Democracy, University of California, Irvine
Visiting Researcher at the Centro de Estudios Avanzados en Ciencias Sociales, Fundación Juan March, Madrid, Spain
Visiting Lecturer at the Université de Montpellier I, France
Visiting Lecturer at the Institute for European Studies, University of Malta

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Partecipante al Progetto di internazionalizzazione del Dipartimento di Scienza Politica (Università di Bologna), finanziato dal Miur: Nuove forme di democrazia? Mutamento e riforme delle istituzioni democratiche
partecipante al PRIN 2007: Le "geometrie variabili" della rappresentanza in una polity complessa: attori e meccanismi rappresentativi nazionali e sovra-nazionali nel contesto dell'Europa integrata
partecipante al PRIN 2009: La costruzione della policy agenda in Italia: il ruolo dei gruppi di interesse
partecipante al PRIN 2015: Politics e policy in Europa in tempo di crisi: Cause e conseguenze (programma di ricerca finanziato, con decorrenza 5/2/2017)

Partecipazione al collegio dei docenti o.content: Docente di Politica Comparata presso il dottorato in Scienza Politica dell'Istituto Italiano di Scienze Umane di Firenze
Docente di Politica Comparata e membro del Collegio dei Docenti del dottorato in Political Science and Sociology presso la Scuola Normale Superiore (sede di Firenze)
